entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
